Hi Richard

> I seem to be stuck.  No matter what I try for my first web crawl, I   
> ALWAYS wind up with no sites downloaded.
> No reports are available, but the job moves immediately to finished.
> The output log shows the job started and shut down.
> Can anyone help me understand why?

Since you do not provide any useful details at all, you cannot expect  
to receive a helpful answer.

At least, please be so kind and provide the version of heritrix and  
the global.sheet configuration file (you can find this in the  
profile-XYZ or completed-XYZ folder.

Best juergen
